title: Data Scientist med AI/ML-fokus til EWIIs Digitale Kundeplatforme
location: Kolding, Region of Southern Denmark, Denmark
description:
**Hvem er vi?**
 Vi er en energikoncern der leverer vand og fjernvarme i trekantomr√•det samt el, bredb√•nd og ladel√∏sninger til kunder i hele Danmark. Vi har inden for de seneste √•r udskiftet alle vores digitale kundevendte platforme, og har nu en st√¶rk digital tilstedev√¶relse med vores hjemmeside, flere selvbetjeningsl√∏sninger, mobilapps og en marketing automation platform. Platformene er integrerede med hinanden og bygget p√• en moderne og prisbel√∏nnet integrationsplatform, hvor data er gjort tilg√¶ngelige via microservices.
   

  

 I Digitale Kundeplatforme drifter og videreudvikler vi platformene i t√¶t samarbejde med andre forretningsomr√•der og vores eget tilknyttede IT\-udviklingsteam. Vi er allerede i gang med at implementere databaserede l√∏sninger, som en del af vores digitale kundeoplevelser, og √∏nsker nu at tage n√¶ste skridt og s√¶tte fart p√• udviklingen.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Du bliver teamets specialist i machine learning og AI og f√•r ansvar for at udvikle, teste og implementere modeller, der udg√∏r det datam√¶ssige fundament for nye digitale l√∏sninger og services til vores kunder.
   

  

 Du kommer til at arbejde hands\-on med modellering, databehandling og kode ‚Äì i t√¶t samspil med relevante afdelinger s√•som IT\-infrastruktur, Data Warehouse og Data Governance. Derudover vil du arbejde sammen med dine kollegaer i teamet, der arbejder med app, web, selvbetjening og marketing automation, om at integrere modellerne direkte i vores digitale platforme og l√∏sninger, s√• de skaber reel v√¶rdi for vores kunder.
   

  

 Hos EWII arbejder andre data scientists med forskellige form√•l p√• tv√¶rs af organisationen, og vi har allerede et st√¶rkt teknologi\- og datasetup p√• plads. I denne rolle f√•r du ansvar for at udvikle modeller baseret p√• kundernes forbrugs\- og adf√¶rdsdata ‚Äì kombineret med relevante tredjepartsdata s√•som vejr\- og boligdata.
   

  

**Eksempler p√• arbejdsopgaver**
* Udvikling og optimering af pr√¶diktive og pr√¶skriptive modeller, som danner udgangspunkt for vores automatiserede kommunikation
* Udvikling og optimering af forbrugsalarmer baseret p√• machine learning og anomalidetektion, som automatisk kan opdage, hvis den enkelte kundes forbrug afviger fra deres normalforbrug
* Udvikling af personaliserede forbrugsrapporter baseret p√• dataanalyse og integreret med generativt AI, som genererer individuelle rapporter med grafer og forklarende tekst.
* Udforske nye teknologier og eksperimentere med ML\- og AI\-baserede l√∏sninger p√• tv√¶rs af platformene.


**Det tilbyder vi** 

 Som medarbejder i EWII er det ikke kun dit arbejde, der er i centrum \- du f√•r ogs√• mange personalegoder, der er v√¶rd at arbejde for. Hvilke goder, du kan nyde godt af, kan du blive klogere p√• her.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi forestiller os, at du har en uddannelse inden for datalogi, machine learning, statistik eller lignende ‚Äì fx cand.scient., cand.polyt. eller cand.it med specialisering i data science. Du har allerede nogen erfaring, og har et √∏nske om at arbejde t√¶ttere sammen med forretningen om dine modeller.
   

  

 Vi l√¶gger v√¶gt p√•, at du:
   

  

  

* Har praktisk erfaring med dataanalyse, statistisk modellering og machine learning i cloud\-baserede milj√∏er, herunder udvikling af pr√¶diktive og preskriptive modeller p√• Azure Databricks\-platformen.
* Har st√¶rke kompetencer inden for Python og SQL.
* Forst√•r, hvordan modeller oms√¶ttes til v√¶rdi i en digital forretningskontekst og gerne i forbindelse med digitale kundevendte platforme.
* Trives i krydsfeltet mellem teknik og forretning og kan forklare komplekse modeller og resultater til ikke\-tekniske kollegaer
* Er nysgerrig, forretningsorienteret og trives med et stort selvst√¶ndigt ansvar for dit ansvarsomr√•de, men s√¶tter pris p√• at arbejde teamorienteret mod vores f√¶lles vision og m√•l.


 I rollen f√•r du
   

  

  

* En central rolle i et ambiti√∏st digitalt team med st√¶rkt mandat og stor indflydelse.
* Frihed til at eksperimentere og udvikle dine egne id√©er til ML\- og AI\-baserede kundel√∏sninger
* Samarbejde med kollegaer, der arbejder med digital performance, UX, app\- og webudvikling, marketing automation og dataplatforme
* Adgang til en moderne teknologistak samtidig med, at du bliver en del af en virksomhed med strategisk fokus p√• digital innovation.


**S√¶t et gr√∏nt fodspor sammen med os** 

 I EWII er hverdagen vidt forskellig for vores 700 medarbejdere. Men f√¶lles for alle er, at fagligheden n√•r helt ud i fingerspidserne ‚Äì og den skal male fremtiden gr√∏n.
   

  

 I EWIIs kommercielle afdelinger kridter vi kondiskoene hver dag ‚Äì uanset om vi l√¶gger arm med energimarkedet, digitaliserer forretningen eller flytter danskerne over p√• fiber. Sammen g√∏r vi det, der er sort til gr√∏n business ‚Äì til gavn for milj√∏, kunder og bundlinje.
   

  

**Er du vores nye kollega?**
 Vi gl√¶der os til at h√∏re fra dig. Du sender sit CV og motiverede ans√∏gning ved at klikke p√• ans√∏gningsknappen. Hos os er diversitet og forskellighed en styrke, og derfor er alle ans√∏gninger velkomne uanset k√∏n, alder, etnicitet, civilstand etc.
   

  

 Har du sp√∏rgsm√•l til jobbet eller EWII som arbejdsplads, s√• kontakt endelig afdelingsleder, Jakob Linde, p√• tlf. 28 25 26 85\. Du kan l√¶se mere om os som virksomhed og arbejdsplads p√• ewii.dk. Er du mere nysgerrig, kan du ogs√• f√∏lge med ovre p√• LinkedIn, Facebook og Instagram.
   

  

 Stillingen bes√¶ttes hurtigst muligt, og du kan s√∏ge den, s√• l√¶nge den er online p√• ewii.dk.‚ÄØVi forventer at afholde de f√∏rste samtaler i uge 32 og 33\.

title: Data Scientist
description:
Playon is looking for a Data Scientist to lead the development of sports rankings systems and internal performance metrics. This role will focus primarily on building datas and algorithms to generate national and state rankings for high school teams to appear on MaxPreps. In addition, you'll support the organization with business intelligence insights to inform strategy, operations, and engagement.
   

  

 In this role, you will leverage your backend development experience and passion for building quality products to make meaningful contributions to our fans‚Äô experience.
   

  

**The outcomes you‚Äôll deliver**
* Develop a variety of rankings algorithms for high school sports
* Provide data insights to inform product strategy


**In This Role, You Can Excpect To**
* Design and implement data\-driven ranking algorithms for sports teams including predictive rankings
* Continuously refine rankings formulas based on feedback from stakeholders
* Ensure the rankings are explainable for public\-facing applications
* Create visualizations of rankings to present data in interactive formats for users and stakeholders
* Collaborate with product, engineering, data, and operations teams to turn data into actionable business insights
* Build and maintain dashboards and reports that provide operational insights for decision\-makers.
* Analyze user engagement and other KPIs to inform product strategies


**To Thrive In This Role, You Have**
* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree (or equivalent experience) in Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field.
* 2\+ years of experience in data science or sports analytics.
* Proficiency in Python, R, or similar data analysis tools.
* Advanced SQL skills with a strong focus on PostgreSQL for efficient extraction and processing of large relational datasets.
* Ability to leverage AI tools and techniques for data analysis, trend detection, and extraction of actionable insights.
* Experience extracting and integrating data from RESTful APIs for analysis and storage.
* Familiarity with BI tools such as Tableau
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain complex information


**How You Play**
* Ownership over Participation\- You take responsibility for achieving holistic outcomes, prioritize key objectives, and adapt quickly when situations require a different approach. You follow through even against the toughest challenges.
* Team over Stars\- You are a bridge builder, establishing processes and relationships with teams outside your own. You work to rally around common goals, find win\-win solutions, compromise when necessary, and help others succeed.
* Growth over Comfort\- You are driven by a desire to grow and actively seek opportunities to expand your comfort zone, skills, and confidence. You embrace new challenges with curiosity, accepting discomfort and failure as opportunities to learn.
* Fairness over Popularity\- You approach decisions with a scientist‚Äôs mindset, challenging your assumptions and remaining objective. You consider long\-term impact rather than relying on short\-term gains, proactively seek others‚Äô perspectives, and manage emotions in decision\-making.


**Company Overview**
 PlayOn is a dynamic growth\-stage company dedicated to championing the spirit of play in the high school space. Backed by KKR, our family of brands‚Äîincluding GoFan, NFHS Network, and MaxPreps‚Äîempowers schools with innovative solutions and exceptional service. Our fan engagement platform is the only one that offers event ticketing, streaming, fundraising, concessions, merchandise sales, and website management in one place. We save administrators time so they can focus on what truly matters: supporting the students, staff, and fans who bring their programs to life.
   

  

 Trusted by thousands of schools across the country, we're here to help create more instant replays, hold\-your\-breath moments, last\-minute comebacks, and games you want to watch over and over again.
   

  

 When being there means everything, we make sure you never miss a moment.
   

  

**Why you‚Äôll love working at PlayOn**
 Product, potential, and people. We‚Äôre a leader in the high school event space, constantly evolving our product to meet the needs of administrators. We focus on solving real challenges, learning quickly, and creating impactful solutions.
   

  

 This is a growth\-stage company, meaning your contributions have real impact. You‚Äôll have opportunities to grow your skills, tackle meaningful problems, and make a difference in the lives of schools and the students and fans they serve.
   

  

 Our culture is built on accountability, collaboration, growth, and fairness. We don‚Äôt just show up‚Äîwe show up for each other. Everyone wears the same jersey, and we play hard, make the extra pass, and cheer one another on. Losses teach us, challenges motivate us, and persistence drives us forward. We value integrity over shortcuts, choosing to do what‚Äôs right even when it‚Äôs hard. Together, we strive to be better every day‚Äîbecause we know that‚Äôs how we win as a team.
   

  

**The Benefits We Offer**
 Multiple medical insurance plans to choose from
   

  

 Dental, vision life and disability insurance
   

  

 Employee Emergency Fund
   

  

 Company equity (stock options)
   

  

 Open PTO policy
   

  

 401K plan with company match
   

  

 Hybrid/flexible work environment
   

  

*Note: Must be a full\-time employee to participate in the company‚Äôs employee health benefit plan. Part\-time employees and interns are not eligible to participate.*

title: Data Scientist (L5) - Customer Service Experimentation
description:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 283 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.
   

  

 Our Customer Service organization works to ensure nothing gets between our members and their favorite shows, movies and games. Data science plays a key role in guiding the CS team to deliver top\-notch customer experiences that are aligned with Netflix's business strategy and executed with high operational excellence. We experiment to improve the Netflix Help Center (help.netflix.com), a key touchpoint for many members who are looking for the most seamless and efficient customer experience possible.
   

  

**In This Role, You Will**
* Lead CS experimentation, from hypothesis generation and test design to interpretation and recommendations
* Research metrics to support new areas of testing, like new pre\-chat experiences
* Partner with Netflix‚Äôs experimentation platform to improve the experience of CS testing, from allocation to analysis
* Partner with CS executives, PMs, data team peers and Finance to further a statistically rigorous, data\-driven decision\-making culture in CS


**We Are Looking For**
* Advanced degree in quantitative field like Statistics, Mathematics, Physics or Economics, or commensurate experience
* Strong statistical knowledge and intuition with experience in product experimentation
* Strong SQL skills and programming experience (Python preferred)
* Ability to effectively communicate technical concepts and convey clear insights to a variety of audiences (engineering, product, senior leadership)
* Experience evaluating language model performance
* Ability to thrive in ambiguity with minimal oversight and process
* Prior experience with Customer Service is not required, but a desire to learn and commitment to become an expert is a must.


 Our compensation structure consists solely of an annual salary; we do not have bonuses. You choose each year how much of your compensation you want in salary versus stock options. To determine your personal top of market compensation, we rely on market indicators and consider your specific job family, background, skills, and experience to determine your compensation in the market range. The range for this role is $170,000 \- $720,000\.
   

  

 Netflix provides comprehensive benefits including Health Plans, Mental Health support, a 401(k) Retirement Plan with employer match, Stock Option Program, Disability Programs, Health Savings and Flexible Spending Accounts, Family\-forming benefits, and Life and Serious Injury Benefits. We also offer paid leave of absence programs. Full\-time hourly employees accrue 35 days annually for paid time off to be used for vacation, holidays, and sick paid time off. Full\-time salaried employees are immediately entitled to flexible time off. See more detail about our Benefits here.
   

  

 Inclusion is a Netflix value and we strive to host a meaningful interview experience for all candidates. If you want an accommodation/adjustment for a disability or any other reason during the hiring process, please send a request to your recruiting partner.
   

  

 We are an equal\-opportunity employer and celebrate diversity, recognizing that diversity builds stronger teams. We approach diversity and inclusion seriously and thoughtfully. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, ancestry, national origin, caste, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, age, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic makeup, marital status, or military service.
   

  

 Job is open for no less than 7 days and will be removed when the position is filled.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
Walmart Global Tech is looking to hire
 **Senior Data Scientist**
 for their
 **Personalization team in Sunnyvale** 
 to support the Personalization and Recommendation development efforts with our eCommerce team
 



  





**About Team**
 :
 



 Our team works closely with our US stores and eCommerce business to better serve customers by empowering team members, stores, and merchants with technological innovation. From groceries and entertainment to sporting goods and crafts, Walmart U.S. offers an extensive selection that our customers value, whether they shop online at Walmart.com, through one of our mobile apps, or in\-store. Focus areas include customers, stores and employees, in\-store service, merchant tools, merchant data science, and search and personalization.
 



  





**What you'll do
 
 :** 



* Leverage machine learning technologies such as
 **Java, Python, Pyspark, Tensorflow, and PyTorch** 
 to design, develop, and implement high\-performance, scalable applications for personalized recommendations.
* Create robust machine learning models using
 **structured and unstructured data sets** 
 and advanced algorithms, including
 **Neural Networks, Regression Models, and Gradient Boosting Algorithms** 
 .
* Collaborate with data engineers and software developers to design and implement data pipelines and architectures that support recommendations at scale.
* Work with stakeholders across the company to understand business needs and develop data\-driven solutions that drive insights and automation.
* Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders through clear and concise reports and presentations.
* Stay up to date with the latest developments in machine learning and apply this knowledge to improve our products and processes.



  





**What you'll bring
 
 :** 



* **Education
 
 : PHD or Masters in Computer Science, Statistics or Mathematics with 1\+ Years of Industry Experience.**
* **Deep Understanding of Machine Learning and AI
 
 :** 
 The candidate should possess a robust understanding of various machine learning algorithms, artificial intelligence, and deep learning techniques. This includes but is not limited to neural networks, gradient boosting algorithms, reinforcement learning, and large language models. They should be able to develop models with both structured and unstructured data sets.
* **Deep understanding of reinforcement learning techniques**
 : Candidates should have a strong background in reinforcement learning, long\-term reward optimization, deep Q\-learning.
* **Proficiency in Programming, SQL and Data Analysis
 
 :** 
 The candidate should be highly proficient in languages such as Java, Python, PySpark, and have experience with machine learning frameworks like Tensorflow and PyTorch. They should be capable of using these technologies to design and develop high\-performance applications. Additionally, they should have strong knowledge in data analysis methods like dimensionality reduction, predictive modelling, clustering, text mining for effective feature engineering.
* **Experience in Large Scale Applied ML Model Building**
 : The candidate should have a prior track record of successfully building, deploying, and maintaining large\-scale machine learning models in a production environment. This includes handling large volumes of data, optimizing model performance, and ensuring the scalability of the solution.
* **Innovation and Problem\-Solving Skills
 
 :** 
 As the role involves working with new technologies, the candidate should have the ability to innovate and solve complex problems. They should be able to adapt to new technologies quickly and find creative solutions for various business problems.



  





**About Walmart Global Tech
 
 :** 




 Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people. That‚Äôs what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We‚Äôre a team of software engineers, data scientists, cybersecurity expert's and service professionals within the world‚Äôs leading retailer who make an epic impact and are at the forefront of the next retail disruption. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations. We are people\-led and tech\-empowered. We train our team in the skillsets of the future and bring in experts like you to help us grow. We have roles for those chasing their first opportunity as well as those looking for the opportunity that will define their career. Here, you can kickstart a great career in tech, gain new skills and experience for virtually every industry, or leverage your expertise to innovate at scale, impact millions and reimagine the future of retail.
 



  





**Benefits:** 




 Benefits: Beyond our great compensation package, you can receive incentive awards for your performance. Other great perks include 401(k) match, stock purchase plan, paid maternity and parental leave, PTO, multiple health plans, and much more.
 



  





**Equal Opportunity Employer:** 




 Walmart, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer By Choice. We believe we are best equipped to help our associates, customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them. That means understanding, respecting and valuing unique styles, experiences, identities, ideas and opinions while being welcoming of all people.
 



  





*The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed in the role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process*

title: Sr. Data Scientist/ ML
description:
SymSoft is looking for a highly skilled and motivated
 **Senior Data Scientist** 
 to join our advanced analytics team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about solving complex problems, building scalable data\-driven solutions, and enabling the next generation of intelligent systems using cutting\-edge technologies, including LLMs and machine learning.
   

  

 You will work closely with data engineers, domain experts, data analysts, and business stakeholders to deliver actionable insights, predictive models, and intelligent automation. This role demands both technical expertise and strong communication skills to bridge data science with business impact.
   

  

**This is an on\-site position in Sacramento, CA.**
**Requirements**
 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Integrate and analyze structured and unstructured data from multiple sources to generate actionable insights.
* Design and implement predictive models and advanced analytics techniques.
* Prepare, clean, and transform data for analysis and model development.
* Build intelligent data pipelines to support LLM\-based applications, including text embeddings, SQL generation, and structured data integration.
* Develop solutions using Python, LLM frameworks, SQL/NoSQL databases, and cloud technologies.
* Apply machine learning, deep learning, and optimization algorithms to drive decision\-making.
* Create and maintain Retrieval\-Augmented Generation (RAG) workflows, prompt engineering methods, and vector\-based search strategies.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams and communicate effectively with stakeholders to align on goals and deliver value.
* Present findings through compelling data visualizations and storytelling using tools like Power BI or Tableau.
* Manage and deliver multiple projects independently in a dynamic, fast\-paced environment.
* Contribute to a collaborative team culture focused on innovation and continuous learning


**Required Experience:**
* PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or a related field.
* Minimum of 10 years of hands\-on experience in data science, statistical modeling, and applied machine learning
* Strong programming skills in at least one data science language (e.g., Python, R, Scala)
* Expertise in working with large structured and unstructured datasets, including experience with big data platforms and data mining techniques
* Proficiency in SQL, data wrangling, and building data pipelines
* Experience with cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud
* A strong understanding of LLMs, embeddings, and NLP techniques is a significant plus
* Familiarity with healthcare data and clinical/business processes is highly desirable
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Self\-motivated, results\-oriented, and capable of working both independently and collaboratively


**Benefits**
* Complimentary snacks, teas, and coffees
* An opportunity to make a difference in people's lives
* Salary Range: $85,000/Year to $110,000/Year (depends on experience and Negotiable)
* Open to Corp\-corp also

title: Growth Data Scientist/ Analyst
description:
We are seeking a dynamic Growth Data Scientist/Analyst to join our Growth team. The successful candidate will be instrumental in leveraging data to drive strategic decisions, optimize growth initiatives, and enhance user acquisition strategies.
 





  




**Responsibilities** 
* Develop and maintain acquisition and engagement (e.g. influencer/affiliate, organic, VIP, , paid acquisition etc.) dashboards to monitor user growth and campaign effectiveness
* Assist in building predictive models to guide strategic decisions on acquisition and engagement, encompassing time series, predictive analytics, and recommender systems
* Analyze data to derive actionable insights that drive business decisions and performance improvements
* Automate repetitive tasks and data processes to enhance team efficiency
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to support data\-driven decisions and project implementations
* Engage in continuous learning to stay ahead of industry trends and leverage new tools and techniques in data analysis



  




**Requirements** 
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a quantitative field such as Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields
* Up to 3 years of experience in data analysis or a related field. Experience in the crypto industry is a plus
* Familiarity with User Acquisition (UA) and/or Customer Relationship Management (CRM) concepts is advantageous
* Proficiency in SQL and familiarity with data visualization tools like Tableau
* Experience with statistical software (e.g., R, Python) and libraries for managing, manipulating, and analyzing data
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
* Adept at queries, report writing, and presenting findings
* Knowledge of acquisition campaign platforms and tools such as Appsflyer, SensorTower, or similar platforms
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills

title: Data Scientist
description:
**Job Summary** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Data Scientist with a strong foundation in statistical analysis, machine learning, backend development, and cloud technologies. The ideal candidate will have a passion for turning complex data into actionable insights that inform key business decisions. This role involves close collaboration with business stakeholders to define technical problem statements, test hypotheses, and build accurate, efficient analytical models aligned with strategic objectives.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Data Integration \& Feature Engineering** 
 : Merge internal and external datasets to develop robust features for machine learning models.
* **Machine Learning \& Statistical Analysis** 
 : Apply techniques like clustering, classification, and regression to solve real\-world problems.
* **Data Visualization \& Communication** 
 : Create dashboards and clearly present insights to both technical and non\-technical audiences.
* **Automation \& Pipelines** 
 : Develop scalable ETL processes using Python and SQL to ensure consistent and high\-quality data flows.
* **NLP \& Unstructured Data** 
 : Use natural language processing (NLP) and large language models (LLMs) to extract insights from text data.
* **Model Deployment** 
 : Deploy machine learning models using platforms like Databricks and integrate them into production pipelines.
* **Simulation \& Distributed Computing** 
 : Leverage simulation techniques and distributed computing to handle large\-scale data efficiently.



**Requirements** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree or higher in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, or a related field. Applicants from other disciplines with relevant certifications and hands\-on experience in data science will also be considered.
* Advanced proficiency in Python for machine learning, backend development, and data pipeline construction.
* Strong background in natural language processing (NLP), with the ability to extract insights from unstructured text data.
* Proficient in SQL, particularly for analyzing large datasets in cloud\-based environments.
* Hands\-on experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure for scalable ML model deployment and data applications.



**Key Skills \& Attributes** 



* Excellent problem\-solving and analytical thinking with high attention to detail.
* Strong communication skills and the ability to convey technical concepts to non\-technical stakeholders.
* Proven team player with experience collaborating across data, engineering, and business teams.
* A passion for building scalable, high\-performance systems in a fast\-paced, Agile work environment.

title: Aramco Global Opportunities Await!
description:
**Aramco \- Global Engineering Opportunities Await in Saudi Arabia \- Register Now!**
 Are you an innovative engineer or scientist looking for your next career challenge? Aramco, the world's leading integrated energy and chemicals company, invites you to register your details with us. We are actively seeking talented engineers and scientists from around the globe, and if your skills match our current or future opportunities, our experienced recruitment team will contact you.
   

  

**Why Aramco?**
 Aramco occupies a special position in the global energy industry. We are one of the world's largest producers of hydrocarbon energy and chemicals, with among the lowest Upstream carbon intensities of any major producer.
   

  

 With our significant investment in technology and infrastructure, we strive to maximize the value of the energy we produce for the world along with a commitment to enhance Aramco's value to society.
   

  

 Headquartered in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and with offices around the world, we combine market discipline with a generations' spanning view of the future, born of our nine decades experience as responsible stewards of the Kingdom's vast hydrocarbon resources. This responsibility has driven us to deliver significant societal and economic benefits to not just the Kingdom, but also to a vast number of communities, economies, and countries that rely on the vital and reliable energy that we supply. We are one of the most profitable companies in the world, as well as amongst the top five global companies by market capitalization.
   

  

**Wh o We're Looking For**
 We are seeking engineers and scientists from various disciplines who are passionate about solving complex challenges. Whether your expertise lies in mechanical, electrical, civil, chemical, or another engineering field, we want to hear from you.
   

  

**Minimum Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Engineering or relevent Bachelors of Science degree
* Minimum of 10 \- 20 years professional experience in your respective engineering discipline


**Our Most Needed Job Disciplines**
 We are looking for professionals at different levels of seniority across the following disciplines. For many of these roles, candidates should have a minimum of 10 years experience for mid\-level positions, and more than 20 years of experience for senior roles.
   

  

* Reforming Specialist
* Polyolefins Technology Specialist
* Hydrogen Specialist Engineer
* Carbon Capture, Usage and Storage
* Advanced Process Control Engineer
* Rotating Equipment Engineer
* Static Equipment Engineer
* Valve Engineer
* Compressor and Steam Turbine
* Gas Turbine Engineer
* Reliability Specialist
* Electrical Engineer \- Motor \& Generator
* Asset Integrity Engineer
* Linear Programming (LP) Engineer
* Structural Engineer
* Geotechnical Engineer
* Estimating Engineer
* Scheduling Engineer
* Maintenance Engineer
* Welding Engineer
* Operational Excellence
* Project Manager
* Civil Engineer
* Stadium Design
* Downstream Market Analyst
* Downstream Pricing Analyst
* Data Scientist
* Refinery Planning
* Exploration Geoscientist
* Geologist
* Reservoir Engineer


 Don't worry if your job discipline is not on this list, we have many other vacancies spanning multiple disciplines and industry sectors.
   

  

**Relocation Opportunity for Expatriates:**
 If you are excited about the opportunity to relocate to Saudi Arabia, we offer a comprehensive relocation package designed to ensure a smooth transition, including: travel assistance, housing, medical, and settling into your new home. Family relocation is also included, if eligible, to support you making a seamless transition.
   

  

**How To Register**
 By registering your details and submitting your resume through our online portal, you take the first step toward a rewarding career with Aramco. Our dedicated team of recruiters will carefully review your credentials and contact you if a suitable position is available immediately or in the future.
   

  

 Country/Region: SA

title: Senior Analytics BI Specialist-Healthcare
description:
**JOB PURPOSE:** 




  





 The role serves as a lead that is responsible for overseeing the development, implementation, and continuous improvement of data analysis operations. This role involves analyzing complex datasets to extract actionable insights that assist in a data\-driven decision making across the organization. The position collaborates closely with the business through the use of business intelligence and AI technologies.
 



  





**KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:** 




  




* Lead data operations analysis, including collection, analysis, and reporting of KPIs/reports.
* Identify automation opportunities using AI and analytics.
* Facilitate workshops to gather business data requirements.
* Analyze data to identify trends and support decisions.
* Develop real\-time dashboards and reports.
* Contribute to data governance policies ensuring accuracy, integrity, and compliance.
* Collaborate cross\-functionally to deliver impactful data solutions.
* Contribute to all data management practices and comply with NCDP and other legal and regulatory standards such
* as the Personal Data Protection Law (PDPPL)
* Comprehensive understanding of data management principles, data warehousing, and analytics
* Deploy advanced analytics and machine learning technologies to enhance data\-driven decision\-making and monetizing



  





**JOB REQUIREMENTS:** 




  





**QUALIFICATIONS:** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer Science , Data Science, or related fields (Master‚Äôs preferred).
* Strong communication and stakeholder engagement skills.



**EXPERIENCE:** 



* 9\+ years of experience, with at least 4 years in extensive data implementation in a Healthcare setting, GDPR compliance and analytics.



**SKILLS** 



* Expertise in BI tools, statistical analysis, AI, Machine learning , big data, and data warehousing.
* Proficient in Understanding data management and governance and compliance with excellent organizational, time management, written, and verbal skills.
* Proficiency in data technologies, tools, and trends, including data privacy and security (GDPR compliance)
* Analytical \& problem\-solving skills, with good attention to detail while having the ability to make informed decisions, solve problems and analyze complex data sets
* Ability to develop concise and meaningful data summaries and analysis for presentations and publications.
* Data Science Professional Certificate/ Certified Analytics Professional (CAP)/ Azure Data Scientist Associate/ Data Science Professional Certificate
* Proficiency with SQL, Python, TensorFlow, ETL Tools: Pentaho, Spoon, Terraform, Data Lakes \& Warehousing, Secure programming, applied cryptography
* Understanding of data management and governance with excellent organizational, time management, written, and verbal skills.

title: Senior Data Scientist - Arabic Speaker
description:
üíº Job Overview ‚Äì Senior Data Scientist (Agentic AI, LLMs \& MLOps)
 



  





 Location: Doha, Qatar / Remote
 



 Languages: Fluency in Arabic and English is required
 



 Company: Ghaia.ai \|
 *Redefining the Boundaries of Possible* 




  





 At Ghaia.ai, we are pioneering the future of autonomous AI systems by merging the power of large language models (LLMs), Agentic AI architectures, and enterprise\-grade MLOps on the Microsoft Azure ecosystem. As a Senior Data Scientist, you will play a pivotal role in driving our AI product innovation and customer delivery, blending hands\-on development with strategic thinking.
 



  





 We are looking for a seasoned expert who can go beyond building models ‚Äî someone who can engineer scalable solutions, deploy them reliably, and ensure they evolve intelligently. You‚Äôll work at the intersection of applied research, solution delivery, and AI infrastructure to build intelligent agents that solve real business problems.
 



  





 üåü What You‚Äôll Be Doing (Key Focus Areas)
 



  





 üîß Autonomous \& Multi\-Agent Systems
 



  





 ‚Ä¢ Design, build, and deploy AI\-powered autonomous agents capable of executing complex tasks and reasoning independently.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Develop multi\-agent orchestration frameworks using LangGraph, AutoGen, or CrewAI for enterprise\-grade use cases.
 



  





 üß† LLMs \& Generative AI
 



  





 ‚Ä¢ Fine\-tune and optimize large language models for contextual understanding, summarization, classification, and dialogue systems.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implement retrieval\-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines using vector databases and embedding strategies for grounding LLMs in enterprise data.
 



  





 üìä Predictive Modeling \& ML
 



  





 ‚Ä¢ Build and deploy traditional ML models (classification, regression, time\-series forecasting) to support analytical decision\-making.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Collaborate on data science projects with a focus on explainability, accuracy, and performance.
 



  





 ‚öôÔ∏è MLOps \& Deployment
 



  





 ‚Ä¢ Own the end\-to\-end lifecycle of AI models, from experimentation to scalable deployment in production using MLOps best practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Work closely with engineering to ensure CI/CD for ML, automated testing, monitoring, and retraining of models in Azure ML or Databricks.
 



  





 üåê Azure AI \& Cloud AI Architecture
 



  





 ‚Ä¢ Leverage Microsoft Azure‚Äôs AI stack ‚Äì OpenAI, Cognitive Services, Azure ML Studio, Synapse, and containerized deployments ‚Äì to build cloud\-native AI solutions.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Design robust and secure architectures that scale across clients and verticals.
 



  





 ü§ù Collaboration \& Mentorship
 



  





 ‚Ä¢ Partner with solution architects, product teams, and front\-end engineers to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Mentor junior data scientists and contribute to knowledge\-sharing across the AI and product teams.
 



 üéØ Expectations \& Impact
 



  





 As a Senior Data Scientist at Ghaia.ai, you are expected to:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Take technical ownership of AI components across projects and products.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Drive experimentation and rapid prototyping to validate ideas.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Push the limits of innovation by exploring new AI paradigms, especially in autonomous systems and self\-improving agents.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensure reliable and secure deployment pipelines, reinforcing AI quality and trust at scale.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Balance hands\-on delivery with strategic thinking to align with Ghaia‚Äôs roadmap and mission

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
DESCRIPTION

**About Prestatech**




At Prestatech, we're redefining the financial world by fostering innovation and challenging the traditional banking system. Our culture is diverse, dynamic, and forward\-thinking. From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting\-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.




Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.




When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.


We‚Äôre a young and fast\-growing company‚Äîbut this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.




We‚Äôre passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.




To date, we have raised ‚Ç¨8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..

  

We‚Äôre now looking for a **Senior Data Scientist**, someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands\-on, outcome\-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.  



  

You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:  



  

* selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques
* processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis
* deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis
* implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies
* design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI\-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.
* collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science
* own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful
leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results  
* 

  

  

REQUIREMENTS

* 6\+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)
* Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.
* Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques
* Proficient in Python, with hands\-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit\-learn
* Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases
* Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code
Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus  
* 

  

Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.

 **Benefits**

* Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact
* A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level
* Annual training budget to help you grow and develop
* 2 days per week of WFH (\+ 3 days at the office)
* Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work
* Bi\-annual company offsites
* Referral bonus
* a very nice office in one of the best district of Berlin (Mitte)

 **Recruitment Process:**

  

* HR Interview (30 minutes)
* Assessment Test (up to 60 minutes)
* CEO/CTO Interview (30 minutes)

  

If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to support you.

  

At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind ‚Äî including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.


With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.
company_description: Prestatech is a digital credit factory that has developed an innovative underwriting platform for banks and financial institutions in Europe.

title: Data Engineer & Scientist (f/d/m)
description:
#### **THE ROLE**


Are you ready to make a **real impact**? Are you excited by the opportunity to grow your coding skills while unlocking climate action for enterprise organizations?  

  

Then join CEEZER and help companies across the globe to leverage a truly **impactful solution** that is finally fixing how companies get to net\-zero using the voluntary carbon market and data\-led insights. Use your skills to tackle one of the most critical challenges humanity has ever faced: climate change.  

  

We are looking for a versatile **Data Engineer \& Scientist (f/d/m)**, who will play a key role in structuring and operationalizing our data, enabling teams to access insights and tools without relying on spreadsheets or manual workarounds.

#### **YOUR MISSION**

* Own, design, implement, and maintain data pipelines using Python (and Airflow).
* Explore and implement use cases with large language models (LLMs) to improve data workflows and automation.
* Structure and optimize our data lake and warehouse environments.
* Integrate and manage data in AWS using S3 and Lambda.
* Support the migration from Google Sheets to scalable and automated data systems.
* Build internal data interfaces using low\-code or no\-code tools, enabling non\-technical users to input and retrieve data easily.
* Collaborate with product, engineering, and operations to understand data needs and co\-design solutions.

#### **WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED**

* Around three years of experience as a Data Engineer or Data Scientist
* Strong Python skills for data processing and automation, knowledge of Airflow is a plus.
* Excellent SQL proficiency.
* Experience working with LLMs:
	+ Implementation of OpenAI APIs for data automation and enrichment.
	+ Prompt engineering for dynamic queries and natural language interfaces.
	+ Experience with model evaluation and fine\-tuning is a plus.
* Proven track record in building and maintaining data lakes or similar architectures in a cloud environment.
* Experience in analysing and modelling risk data sets is a plus.
* Ability to lead projects with multiple stakeholders.
* Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.
* A valid working permit in Germany.

#### **WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU AT CEEZER**

* **A mission that matters:** Join a rapidly growing, dynamic team of international changemakers who are passionate about solving the world‚Äôs most pressing challenge and help shape a sustainable, net\-zero future.
* **A learning culture**: Take your skills to the next level with exciting growth opportunities, hands\-on learning experiences, and access to resources designed to fuel your professional journey in a start\-up that prioritizes learning and growth.
* **A diverse environment:** Thrive in an inclusive environment where diversity is celebrated, and your unique perspective helps us flourish as a team.
* **A net\-zero career**: From day one, your professional and personal carbon footprint is neutralized‚Äîbecause at CEEZER, sustainability isn‚Äôt just our mission, it‚Äôs how we operate.
* **An attractive package**: Enjoy perks like free Urban Sports Club membership, a discounted public transport, a company pension scheme, team events and offsites, and more‚Ä¶

#### **EXCITED TO CREATE IMPACT WITH US?**


If you don't meet every requirement but have **exceptional strengths** that could make you **excel in this role**, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now and let's discuss your potential.  

  

The recruitment process entails the following:

  

* An intro call with the People Team.
* A 1\-hour call with our SVP Tech, Felipe.
* A deep dive case study with two members from the Tech team.
* A final call with Carla, our Chief Impact Officer.


We prohibit discrimination or harassment of any kind and make employment and other employee lifecycle decisions based solely on merit, skills, and potential. We actively work to recognize and address unconscious biases, fostering an environment where all individuals feel valued and empowered to succeed. We welcome **diverse applicants** and are dedicated to providing **equal opportunities** for everyone to thrive. Please let us know if you have any specific needs regarding this application process.#### **About us**


As companies strive to meet ambitious climate goals, navigating the complex voluntary carbon market can be challenging ‚Äîbut CEEZER cuts through the confusion with a clear, data\-driven platform for seamless access and impact.  

  

CEEZER is a digital platform providing companies with easy, secure, and direct access to high\-quality projects from the entire voluntary carbon market. With over 13\.5 million data points, CEEZER brings transparency to the carbon market, highlighting critical differences in project quality, risk, and impact. CEEZER's expert team provides dedicated support to leading enterprise companies, enabling customers to navigate the carbon market, centrally manage carbon credit portfolios, and achieve climate targets faster. With a commitment to impact\-optimized carbon removal, CEEZER transforms how enterprises screen, purchase, and manage negative emissions. For more information, visit ceezer.earth.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
**About Fit Analytics Innovation GmbH** 




  





 Fit Analytics Innovation is a leading technology company specializing in innovative and sustainable solutions for the retail industry. Our mission is to revolutionize the online shopping experience by providing personalized recommendations including size and fit, style, and alternative product suggestions. Our technologies support shoppers and retailers alike by reducing returns, increasing conversions, enhancing customer satisfaction, and ultimately helping the environment.
 



  





 As a trusted partner of leading global apparel and footwear retailers, Fit Analytics is dedicated to optimizing the online shopping journey. By seamlessly integrating our sizing technology, we empower customers to make informed choices, leading to a more efficient and enjoyable shopping experience.
 



  





 Our cutting\-edge AI solution \- Fit Finder \- delivers precise size recommendations tailored to individual customers. Our machine learning technology takes brand\-specific sizing variations and individual body measurements into account, ensuring a personalized and reliable fit for each shopper.
 



  





 Our team members come from all around the world, creating a global collective of passionate domain experts dedicated to solving sizing for our partners and their shoppers.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 Embark on an exciting journey with Fit Analytics Innovation as a Senior Data Scientist, where you'll play a pivotal role in driving the success of our cutting\-edge recommendation solutions. As a seasoned professional, you will contribute to projects in production with your strong ML and SWE skillset. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to pave the way forward with innovative ideas and bring them to life.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop state of the art solutions for apparel sizing, style, and product recommendations.
* Experience with implementing the lifecycle of ML solutions
* Champion best practices in code quality, review, and software architecture.
* Drive continuous innovation in ML techniques and strategies to maintain competitive advantage and keep pace with industry standards.
* Collaborate with product and engineering teams to align ML technologies with business goals and enhance customer outcomes.



  





**Requirements and Qualifications:** 



* Proven experience as a Senior Data Scientist, particularly in recommendation systems and scalable ML solutions.
* Proficient in Python and SQL.
* Extensive experience with ML frameworks and tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and ML serving technologies like TensorFlow Serving or NVIDIA Triton.
* Proficient in developing and optimizing ML pipelines, model deployment, and serving strategies.
* Strong record of software engineering best practices
* Motivated and proactive individual who can work independently, manage priorities effectively, and take ownership of their projects
* Proactive attitude towards organizational growth, personal development and developing team spirit
* Excellent problem\-solving skills and the ability to communicate complex ideas effectively with all levels of an organization.
company_industry: Retail Apparel and Fashion and Software Development

title: Data Scientist (m/w/d)
description:
Aufgaben
   

  

* Als Data Scientist (m/w/d) entwickelst und implementierst du eigenst√§ndig Datenmodelle und \-algorithmen f√ºr unsere kundenspezifischen L√∂sungen. Dabei identifizierst und analysierst du Probleme in einem analytischen Rahmen
* Du entwickelst und wartest Datenpipelines und Dashboards. Dabei arbeitest du an einer Vielzahl von datenbezogenen Komponenten wie Datenplattformen, Dashboards und Produkten rund um Data und Machine Learning
* Arbeit an komplexen Projekten und Datens√§tzen, Analyse von Gesch√§ftsproblemen und √úbersetzung in datenwissenschaftliche L√∂sungen
* Deine Kommunikationsst√§rke nutzt du, um in enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Kunden deren Probleme zu analysieren und die Ergebnisse effektiv zu kommunizieren.
* Du arbeitest √ºber verschiedene Technologie\-Stacks hinweg (z. B. Azure, AWS, GCP, DBX, ELK, Spark, Databricks usw.)
* Mentor f√ºr Junior Data Scientists und Wissenstransfer im Team
* Du profitierst von unserem Team, Lernressourcen, Hackathons und anderen Quellen, um deine technische Entwicklung voranzutreiben und in der Community f√ºr maschinelles Lernen pr√§sent zu sein


**Benefits**
* Regelm√§√üige und systematische (externe und interne) Weiterbildungsm√∂glichkeiten in den Bereichen Data Engineering, Cloud\-Architektur und Data Science
* Zugang zu branchen√ºbergreifenden Projekten (gro√üe und mittelst√§ndische Unternehmen aus den Bereichen Banken, Versicherungen, Automotive, Einzelhandel usw.)
* Branchenf√ºhrenden Kooperationen in den Bereichen Cloud, BI und AutoML
* Arbeit in einer offenen, flachen Umgebung, innerhalb eines breiten Reply\-Netzwerks zum Wissensaustausch
* Preisgekr√∂nte B√ºror√§ume in der M√ºnchner Innenstadt mit Zugang zur Stammstrecke
* Fahrkarte f√ºr √∂ffentliche Verkehrsmittel mit Deutschlandticket
* Zuschuss zu einer Fitnessstudio\-Mitgliedschaft in einem Fitnessstudio der Wahl oder die Nutzung von Wellpass

title: Senior Data Scientist - Quantum Sensing Applications
description:
**Description**





 QuantumDiamonds transforms cutting‚Äëedge quantum‚Äësensing research into production tools that let chipmakers see current flow inside advanced semiconductor devices in seconds. As a
 **Senior Data Scientist** 
 you‚Äôll own the end‚Äëto‚Äëend analytics of our quantum‚Äëdiamond microscope \- optics, electronics and signal processing \- and lift its performance through rigorous data‚Äëdriven engineering.
 



  

  




**Who we are**

 Founded in 2022 as a spin\-off of TU Munich, QD leverages quantum sensors to rapidly capture three\-dimensional current maps within multi\-layer chips. Our 30\-strong team of physicists, engineers, and data scientists works side by side with major semiconductor manufacturers, helping them in chip debugging and accelerating their yield analysis. Backed by top\-tier deep tech investors, semiconductor experts, and strategic public programs, we have ensured long\-term stability, shifting from breakthrough to scale \- and shaping the next chapter in chip testing.
   

  




**Why join Quantum Diamonds?**

**Picture this:**



* A machine that catches what others miss ‚Äì in milliseconds.
* Physics, data, and engineering are working hand in hand to build tools that matter.
* An international team, who loves solving hard problems and where knowledge flows fast.


**Still unsure about why joining us?**
* You'll get to build a company together with a brilliant and welcoming team on a product that has never been done before.
* Our technology is the cutting edge of tomorrow, starting today and not in 10 years.
* You will work directly with major semiconductor companies from Day 1\.
* You'll get virtual shares and act on behalf of the entire company, beyond just your own team.
* You‚Äôll be part of a high\-growth company backed by top\-tier investors.


**Let‚Äôs make the invisible visible!** 

  

  




**What will you do**




* **Analyse quantum‚Äësensing datasets** 
 , extract physical insight and turn it into actionable feedback for customers.
* **Design, execute and interpret experiments** 
 that probe the optical, electronic and digital signal chains of our microscopes.
* Pinpoint bottlenecks and
 **introduce improvements across hardware and software** 
 , championing data‚Äëdriven engineering practices.
* **Mentor junior data scientists** 
 and raise the bar for analysis, documentation and reproducibility.
* Communicate findings in
 **clear reports and concise visuals** 
 to both internal teams and external partners in the semiconductor ecosystem.



  

  




**What is expected of you**




* **PhD in Physics, Optical/Electrical Engineering, Applied Mathematics, or a closely related discipline** 
 ; exceptional candidates with an MSc and 6\+ years of hands\-on R\&D experience are also encouraged to apply.
* Proven track record of
 **4\+ years in a data science and R\&D setting outside of academia** 
 working with complex optical and/or electronic measurement equipment.
* Expertise in
 **statistical data analysis, experimental design and signal processing** 
 with a passion for data‚Äëdriven decision making.
* Demonstrated experience
 **developing advanced algorithms** 
 for signal processing \- from concept through to deployment.
* **Fluency in Python** 
 (NumPy, SciPy, pandas, matplotlib) and version control.
* Ability to
 **translate raw data into clear stories for technical and non‚Äëtechnical audiences** 
 .
* Collaborative mindset and
 **willingness to work hands‚Äëon in the lab** 
 .
* A
 **background in quantum sensing technologies** 
 is a significant plus.



  

  




**Our benefits**




* Competitive salary with equity participation.
* 30 days of paid vacation plus public holidays.
* Annual learning and development budget.
* Regular off\-sites and team events.



  

  




**About us**






 QuantumDiamonds develops and deploys world\-leading quantum sensing technologies and tools for the failure analysis and metrology of a new generation of semiconductor chips, enabling innovation within the heterogeneous integration and advanced packaging era. In close collaboration with leading customers across the globe, our expert teams of quantum physicists, engineers, and data scientists design metrology tools that move the industry forward.
 




 If you have any questions regarding the application process or whether you are the right fit for QuantumDiamonds GmbH, please don't hesitate to contact us at
 

**careers@qd\-st.** 
**com** 


**.**

title: (Senior) Data Scientist (m/f/d)
description:
**PAUL Tech AG** 
 is a technology leader in the real estate industry with the
 **mission**

 **carbon neutral**

 and
 **energy costs**

 **combat climate change**

**(Senior) Data Scientist (m/f/d) in Mannheim**

**The skillset we are looking for**

 and

 (specifically regression or reinforcement learning) preferably within a business context
  
* Strong zeal for Data Crunching and
 **Wrangling**
  
* Good applied statistical skills, including knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood estimators
  
* Proficiency in SQL and Python for data exploration and model building
  
* A proactive and
 **collaborative mindset** 
 , with the ability to work effectively in cross\-functional teams
  
* Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills with the ability to articulate complex ideas
  
* A passion for learning, hands\-on work, taking ownership, and making an impact
  


  


**Bonus points if you bring** 



  

  
* Experience in developing and implementing generative AI models and algorithms
  
* Familiarity with natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision for generative AI applications
  


  

**What you can expect from us** 
  

  
* A
 **meaningful job** 
 that contributes to global CO2 savings
  
* A
 **collegial** 
 working
 **atmosphere** 
 with
 **short decision paths**
  
* A
 **permanent contract** 
 with an
 **above\-average salary**
  
* **30 days vacation** 
 per calendar year
 **plus** 
 24\.12\. and 31\.12\.
 **off**
  
* Company
 **private health insurance** 
 and
 **supplementary pension**
  
* Company
 **fitness subsidy** 
 in your region
  
* Regular
 **company events** 
 to which you are very welcome
  
* **Tram ticket** 
 as well as drinks and fruit in our offices
  


  


 Would you like to become part of us? Then apply here.

Unsere Echtzeitdaten bieten Netzbetreibern tiefe Einblicke in das Stromnetz und ebnen so den Weg f√ºr intelligente Netze, Elektromobilit√§t und eine nachhaltige Energiewende.**

title: Senior Search Data Scientist - NLP
description:
About us
 



 RavenPack is the leading big data analytics provider for financial services. Financial professionals and organizations rely on RavenPack for its speed and accuracy in analyzing large amounts of unstructured content. Our products help clients enhance their decision\-making by quantifying the impact of media sentiment and attention.
 



 Our clients include the world‚Äôs most successful hedge funds, banks, and government agencies. As we continue to grow, we're looking for passionate, technically skilled professionals to join our Search Team.
 



  





 Join RavenPack:
 



 At RavenPack, our search engine is the gateway through which financial professionals access critical information. Our mission is to architect and build the most sophisticated, scalable, and intelligent search engine in the market, powering Bigdata.com.
 



 To make this gateway truly intelligent, we are looking for an insightful and experienced Senior Search Data Scientist to join our Search Team. This is a strategic role designed for a scientist who is driven to understand the "why" behind every search, defining and building our relevance systems from the ground up. In an environment where user privacy is paramount, the intelligence of our search engine must come from a profound, first\-principles understanding of our content.
 



 You will own the full analytical and modeling lifecycle, from analyzing content and building gold\-standard benchmarks, to developing the next generation of our relevance, ranking, and query understanding models.
 



 This role is for a natural problem\-solver who combines scientific rigor with product intuition, and who is passionate about seeing their insights directly translate into a smarter, more intuitive search experience.
 



  





**European legal working status is required.** 




  





 What You'll Be Doing
 


* Become an Expert on Content: Dive deep into our vast corpus of documents, understanding its intrinsic properties. Build and maintain benchmark datasets, to serve as the core for all our improvements and initiatives.
* Translate Query Intent into Search intelligence: Work on the development of our query understanding capabilities. Develop and fine\-tune a range of efficient Language Models for specialized tasks related to content enrichment and query understanding, such as Named Entity Recognition or topic classification.
* Build Advanced Relevance Features: Architect the features and models that power our core ranking and re\-ranking systems, using insights derived from deep content and query analysis.
* Own the Science of Search Evaluation: Champion a culture of data\-driven decision\-making. You will design and analyze offline experiments and tests to prove the impact of our work and guide the product roadmap.
* Collaborate on Product Strategy: Act as a strategic partner to Product Managers and Engineers. Gather and analyse user feedback, identifying their information needs. Your analysis and insights will be critical in identifying new opportunities and shaping the future direction of our search and discovery products.



  





 What We're Looking For
 


* A Master‚Äôs or PhD in a quantitative field (e.g., Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics) and 4\+ years of professional experience in data science with a focus on Search or Recommender Systems.
* A proven track record of working on search relevance, ranking, query understanding or solving closely\-related NLP problems.
* Demonstrable, hands\-on experience building, fine\-tuning, and evaluating a range of language models for specific tasks like classification, NER, and semantic similarity.
* Experience in experimental design and statistical analysis. Expertise in creating evaluation datasets and developing relevance guidelines. You know how to ask the right questions and how to design experiments that provide clear, statistically significant answers.
* A talent for structuring ambiguous problems and applying logical reasoning, translating complex challenges into clear, actionable plans.
* High proficiency in Python and data science libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Scikit\-learn, PyTorch/TensorFlow, Hugging Face) and familiarity with SQL or other query languages.
* The ability to distill complex findings into clear, concise insights for diverse audiences, from engineers to executives. You are a collaborator by nature.



  





 Bonus Points:
 


* Direct experience in the financial services or financial data industry.
* Experience with knowledge graph construction.
* Experience analyzing data from search platforms like Vespa.



  





 What's in it for you?
 


* Growth Opportunity: Join a team building AI that truly matters, contributing to making Gen\-AI useful for finance and business research in a rapidly growing company with 180\+ team members across offices in Marbella, Madrid and New York.
* International Culture: Be part of a diverse, global organization with a truly international culture.
* Team of Superstars: Work alongside a talented team of professionals, including Silicon Valley executives and Wall Street veterans.
* Competitive Compensation: We offer a highly competitive salary package and performance\-based bonuses.
* Relocation Assistance: Comprehensive relocation support is available to help you and your family move to the beautiful Costa del Sol.
* Work\-Life Balance: Enjoy paid vacation, flexible time\-off, and a flexible work policy.
* Continuous learning: We provide the support needed to grow within the team.
* Shuttle bus: From Malaga, Fuengirola, La Riviera, and Estepona is available for free from the company.

title: Lead Data Scientist (pre-sales experience)
description:
Data scientists at Thoughtworks are responsible for leading and executing data science projects. They employ their profound expertise in statistics, modeling, machine learning algorithms and data mining methodologies. They integrate this expertise with a comprehensive understanding of related domains to render business value and illuminate data\-driven insights, facilitating clear and effective decision\-making processes. Their responsibilities encompass devising strategies, executing plans, operationalizing solutions and articulating the tangible business outcomes achieved. Collaborating with cross\-functional teams is pivotal, as they adeptly convey their discoveries to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders. They stay up\-to\-date with industry advancements, ensure data quality and security, and provide guidance to junior team members.
   

  

 As a data scientist at Thoughtworks, you'll work on a range of projects and leverage deep technical knowledge to solve complex business problems.
   

  

 Job responsibilities
   

  

* You will lead and manage data science projects from inception to completion, including goal\-setting, scope definition and ensuring on\-time delivery with cross team collaboration.
* You will collaborate with stakeholders to understand their strategic objectives and identify opportunities to leverage data and data quality for enabling AI and machine learning.
* You will be responsible for the overall AI system design, problem framing and governance, identifying and managing risks and issues.
* You will design, develop and implement data science strategies that drive measurable business results.
* You will design experiments for the team to rapidly test ideas and assumptions, and identify future courses of action.
* You will use quality metrics to select machine learning models that will be deployed in the production environment.
* You will communicate technical findings and insights to stakeholders in a clear, easy and concise way, keeping the stakeholders in mind.
* You will contribute to the growth of the data science community along with promoting a culture of data literacy within the organization.
* You will address ethical concerns and adhere to ethical guidelines using FATTER AI (fairness, accountability, transparency, trustworthiness, explainability, responsibility).
* You will work with CD4ML practices and data versioning tools.


**Job Qualifications**
 Technical Skills
   

  

* You have experience in leading the analysis and modeling of different datasets and overseeing an inception to deploying and productionizing the models.
* You have experience with statistical modeling, hypothesis testing, machine learning, deep learning, optimization and other data science techniques to implement end\-to\-end data science projects.
* You understand the specialized areas of AI and possess a speciality with at least one of them (i.e.: NLP/computer vision/Generative AI, etc)tc).
* You have experience with Python and can write production\-ready code that is easy to evolve and test.
* You gather and preprocess large volumes of structured and unstructured data from various sources, ensuring data quality and integrity.
* You analyze datasets using statistical and visualization techniques to identify patterns, trends and relationships.
* You develop and implement machine learning models, algorithms and predictive analytics to solve specific business problems or improve existing processes.
* You evaluate model performance using appropriate metrics and validate models to ensure robustness and reliability.
* You interpret and effectively communicate findings and insights to non\-technical stakeholders through reports, presentations and visualizations.
* You ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and ethical standards when handling sensitive information.
* You possess strong English and Spanish communication and relationship\-building skills, including written, verbal, and facilitation skills (must\-have)
* You have pre\-sales experience (must\-have)


 Professional Skills
   

  

* You understand the importance of stakeholder management and can easily liaise between clients and other key stakeholders throughout projects, ensuring buy\-in and gaining trust along the way.
* You are resilient in ambiguous situations and can adapt your role to approach challenges from multiple perspectives.
* You don‚Äôt shy away from risks or conflicts, instead you take them on and skillfully manage them.
* You are eager to coach, mentor and motivate others and you aspire to influence teammates to take positive action and accountability for their work.
* You enjoy influencing others and always advocate for technical excellence while being open to change when needed.
* You are a proven leader with a track record of encouraging teammates in their professional development and relationships.
* Cultivating strong partnerships comes naturally to you; You understand the importance of relationship building and how it can bring new opportunities to our business.


**Other things to know**
 Learning \& Development
   

  

 There is no one\-size\-fits\-all career path at Thoughtworks: however you want to develop your career is entirely up to you. But we also balance autonomy with the strength of our cultivation culture. This means your career is supported by interactive tools, numerous development programs and teammates who want to help you grow. We see value in helping each other be our best and that extends to empowering our employees in their career journeys.
   

  

**About Thoughtworks**
 Thoughtworks is a dynamic and inclusive community of bright and supportive colleagues who are revolutionizing tech. As a leading technology consultancy, we‚Äôre pushing boundaries through our purposeful and impactful work. For 30\+ years, we‚Äôve delivered extraordinary impact together with our clients by helping them solve complex business problems with technology as the differentiator. Bring your brilliant expertise and commitment for continuous learning to Thoughtworks. Together, let‚Äôs be extraordinary.

title: Data & Ai Cloud Platform Engineer For European It Hub In Barcelona
description:
**Company**
 A leading international retailer with more than 570\.000 employees worldwide in 33 different countries and over 13\.500 stores, has stablished an IT HUB in Barcelona as part of his IT division, responsible for the selection and provision of IT infrastructure, IT platforms and business applications.
   

  

 With our agile mentality we are looking for people that is willing to make an impact on projects and solutions used worldwide by millions of customers.
   

  

 Agrupa Global Talent collaborates with our client to attract the best talent for its ITHUB located in Barcelona.
   

  

 We are looking for open\-minded colleagues with passion for technology.
   

  

 We offer you diverse and exciting career opportunities in a dynamic work environment that stands for development and progress.
   

  

 Elevate your career with us, where development and progress are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

 If you feel ready and think this opportunity is for you, we would be happy to meet you.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

 Develop new features for our group\-wide Data \& AI Cloud Platform or optimize and extend existing ones
   

  

 Support operational tasks and enable platform users
   

  

 Monitor and increase the security of our platform and its applications
   

  

 Automate the deployment and management of components
   

  

 Evaluate new data and AI technologies and integrate them into the existing ecosystem
   

  

 Collaborate with other IT departments, Engineers, Data Scientist and business users and work together on challenges and solutions
   

  

 Analyze new requirements and work on the design and implementation of them
   

  

**Required Skills**
 You have relevant professional experience in developing and implementing a cloud or on\-premises platform for Data \& AI applications
   

  

 Experience and passion for software development, architecture and design (ideally with Python)
   

  

 Experience with Sparks, Databricks and in building Data Pipelines.
   

  

 Experience with APIs Python development (FastAPI).
   

  

 Experience with various cloud services and tools (e.g.
   

  

 within Azure or GCP)
   

  

 A plus would be knowledge with larger SaaS/PaaS services such as Snowflake, Databricks, Kubernetes (AKS/GKE) or Confluent
   

  

 A team player with good communication skills that enjoys big responsibilities and a fast\-paced environment
   

  

 You work in an agile way and are willing to learn and grow continuously
   

  

 Advanced English is a must, German a nice to have
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 You will be part of an international team composed by people from different countries and backgrounds, where you'll be able to share your experience and knowledge to carry\-out team work and meet the objectives.
   

  

 On top of this, you'll have a personal follow\-up with your management team to help you understanding all business\-related questions and guide you in your professional career.
   

  

 We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package: lunch vouchers, health and dental insurance, transport, wellbeing, etc.
   

  

 Contact
   

  

 If you are interested, please apply directly or send your CV to \*\*\*\*\*\*
